index.name: scdl
index.subtitle: South Carolina Digital Library
index.about: The South Carolina Digital Library provides free access to historic materials illustrating the history and culture of South Carolina from over 40 cultural heritage institutions across the state.
index.description: Metadata guidelines created for the South Carolina Digital Library.

mappings.title: South Carolina Digital Library Metadata Schema & Guidelines
mappings.description: The element descriptions presented here represent the Dublin Core fields for the item-level records created and maintained for the South Carolina Digital Library.
